text:
• Use the left arrow to move backward and use the right arrow to move forward.
  • Choose the type of change you have identified and highlight the respective phrase(s) in the text.
  • Double-click the highlighted text to remove the highlighting of a span.
  • Hover over the labels to see their description.
  • Double-click the highlighted text to remove the highlighting of a span.
  • Click on Annotation Codebook in the navigation toolbar to find annotation examples and detailed descriptions of the change types.
